nameEntry.part: Institute of Sisters of Mercy of Australia and Papua New Guinea Archives, Stanmore

biogHist.abstract: The Institute of Sisters of Mercy of Australia and Papua New Guinea (ISMAPNG) Archives, Stanmore, contains the records of institutions formerly run by the former Goulburn Congregation of the Sisters of Mercy. In 2012 the Sisters of Mercy, Goulburn Congregational Archives became part of ISMAPNG.
biogHist.p: Application for access to records held by the Institute of Sisters of Mercy of Australia and Papua New Guinea Archives must be made, in writing, to the Archivist, providing personal identification documents to establish the right to access information. Physical access to the records is not permitted due to their fragility and the need to protect the confidentiality of information concerning other persons. Information will be forwarded by mail.

cpfRelation.relationEntry: Notices of Reception, Discharge, Death or Admission to Hospital of a Child (1970 - 1977)
Admission Registers, St Joseph's Orphanage, Goulburn (1940 - 1963)

descriptiveNote.p: The ISMAPNG Archives, Stanmore holds the Admission Registers, St Joseph's Orphanage, Goulburn.
The ISMAPNG Archives, Stanmore holds the Notifications of Reception, St Josephs' Orphanage, Goulburn.
The ISMAPNG Archives, Stanmore holds the Notifications of Discharge, St Johns' Home, Goulburn.

cpfRelation.relationEntry: Notifications of Reception, St John's Home, Goulburn (1915 - 1959)

descriptiveNote.p: The ISMAPNG Archives, Stanmore holds the Notifications of Reception, St Johns' Home, Goulburn.
The ISMAPNG Archives, Stanmore holds the Admission Registers from St Johns' Home, Goulburn and St John's Home, Auburn Street, Goulburn.
The ISMAPNG Archives, Stanmore holds the Notifications of Discharge, St Josephs' Orphanage, Goulburn.

cpfRelation.relationEntry: Admission Register, St John's Orphanage, Thurgoona (1882 - 1995)
Sisters of Mercy, Goulburn Congregational Centre (c. 1873 - 2012)

descriptiveNote.p: The ISMAPNG Archives, Stanmore manage the records formerly managed by the Sisters of Mercy, Goulburn Congregational Centre.
